value:
The outfits for the Order of Heroes
are great. I love the fluttery white
capes! Wish I could try one on.

Several of us back home have
been in charge of looking after
our master, Corrin.$k$pThere's me—the maid—and my
slightly older twin sister, and...
who else? Oh yes, Gunter!

So nice that you look out for us.
I'd like to do some patrols too.
I wouldn't mess it up—promise!

I'm not the best at making tea, but I'll
make you some if you want. I...
I hope you like it bitter!

I do my best to carry a tea tray
with poise and elegance. But, uh...
I'll drop it every time!

Hello! You know who asked me to
stop by and say hello? It was
$Nf!$k$pAnd now...I've said it twice!
I think I deserve a raise!
Does this please you?
Whoa, sorry... Flubbed that.

Happy to have this new power!
I'll use it to do my best.

My name is Felicia. I'm one of the very
best maids from the Kingdom of—!
Whoa! Sorry. Dropped my tea tray.

Oh! I'm so glad I found you! Here,
take this! I made you a pot of tea!
It's basically a miracle!$k$pDon't laugh—it took me 14 tries!
Here, taste some! ...So, how is it?$k$pYou like it?! I'm so relieved!
I've finally been able to do
SOMETHING to repay you.$k$pI'm such a klutz, but you're always
so understanding and kind.
I wanted to thank you for that.$k$pI've been working hard to be a
good help to you, and I promise
to keep doing my best!
それっ！
えーいっ！
ひゃっ！
Whoa, whoa, whoa!
No mercy! Not from me!
You're just a stain!
Didn't expect that, did ya?
For my master!
I'm sorry...
Eheehee...
I'll be sure to wake everyone up first thing in the morning. You can count on it!
Did you know that I'm from the Ice Tribe of my world? Now you do!
Everyone in the Order of Heroes is so elegant... That's nice.
My master is an absolutely wonderful person!
Oh, no! I broke another plate!
Practice makes perfect when making tea. I practice a lot!
I have two left feet. And I'm all thumbs! But I'll do my best for you.
OK!
Whoa!
Ready!
